wanita.nama: Dewi Putri Siagian, S.Kom., M.T.I., S.Ak.
wanita.ibu: Delfi Panjaitan, S.E., M.Si., Ak., BKP., CA., CPA., CLI., ASEAN CPA., CFI

intro: Setelah Piter dan Dewi dipertemukan dalam situasi yang tepat, di mana keduanya telah siap untuk memulai hubungan bersama, tibalah mereka di awal perjalanan baru menuju pernikahan.
breaking_news_content:
Halo, teman-teman dan keluarga tersayang! Kami dengan penuh sukacita ingin berbagi kabar bahagia bahwa kami akan segera menikah!

Momen ini adalah langkah baru dalam perjalanan hidup kami, dan kami merasa sangat bersyukur bisa merayakannya bersama orang-orang yang kami cintai.

Kami ingin mengundang kalian semua untuk hadir dan menjadi bagian dari hari istimewa kami, untuk berbagi doa, tawa, dan kebahagiaan bersama.

Dengan penuh cinta,

Dewi & Piter ü§ç

love_story.title: Episode 1: 9 December 2023
love_story.description: It all started with a simple yet meaningful introduction we were introduced by a mutual friend who somehow saw something in us that we hadn‚Äôt yet realized. From there, we became friends online, exchanging quick hellos on social media.

love_story.title: Episode 2: 19 May 2024
love_story.description: Until one day, fate brought us together at a friend‚Äôs wedding. That meeting marked the beginning of a new story. We started spending more time together sharing stories, laughter, and encouragement amid our busy days.

love_story.title: Episode 3: 08 October 2024
love_story.description: Gradually, we realized that our togetherness was no coincidence.¬†October 8th, 2024¬†became a special date the day we chose to begin our journey as a couple.

love_story.title: Final Episode: The Beginning of Forever
love_story.description: Our journey hasn‚Äôt always been smooth, but each challenge has made us stronger, more mature, and more certain that we want to grow old together. Now we‚Äôre ready for the next chapter:¬†exchanging vows¬†before God and the people we love.

gift.title: Wedding Gift
gift.description: Your presence and prayers are our greatest gifts. However, if you would like to send a gift, we have provided some options below:

wishlist.title: Our Wedding Wishlist
wishlist.description: If you prefer to give a physical gift, we've created a wishlist of items we'd love to have in our new home.
